titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress commemorating the heroism and lifetime achievements of the late General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, who died on September 27, 1993.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2328)
Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Census, Statistics and Postal Personnel.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/30/1993--Introduced. Expresses the thanks of the Nation in memory of General James H. "Jimmy" Doolittle, hero, aviation pioneer, scientist, and patriot, for his lifetime of service.
